page.title: 15A CHILD'S DAY - CLAIRE
page.content: Last Saturday I helped my mum hang out the washing. At eight o'clock Dawn, my sister, was still in bed but I was watching the Saturday Picture Show on T.V.. Then Grandad came for me and I put on my coat and shoes and went with Grandad to the launderette in Newhey. Dawn and Mum were left to do all of the housework. When we came back all four of us had sausage and mashed potato for dinner and then we went out to Dale Mill - a local shop. Mum bought me a white cardigan and an anorak. We came back and had tea and then Dawn and I played out with Rachel Shaw until 9.3Op.m.. On Sunday we went to church at 11.OOa.m.. We took our Bibles too. When we came home we had egg sandwiches and went out to play. We met some friends and played a game of rounders.
